Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement Buildings module with mobile-responsive wizard UI

Features Added:
- Complete Buildings CRUD functionality with add and edit operations
- 4-step wizard for building creation/editing \(Basic Info, Address, Geolocation, Photos\)
- Mobile-first responsive design with optimized layouts for mobile, tablet, and desktop
- Geolocation support with browser location API and manual coordinate entry
- Photo upload with preview and removal functionality
- Philippine-themed color scheme \(blue, red, yellow\) from flag

Buildings Management:
- Building list view with cards showing key metrics \(total rooms, occupancy, vacancy rate, revenue\)
- Add new building with comprehensive form validation
- Edit existing buildings with pre-filled data
- Grid layout: 1 column \(mobile\), 2 columns \(tablet\), 3 columns \(desktop\)
- Compact card design optimized for mobile screens

Wizard Implementation:
- Step 1: Basic Information \(name, total rooms, floors, description\)
- Step 2: Address Information \(street, city, province, zip, contact details\)
- Step 3: Geolocation \(required\) - browser location or manual lat/lng entry
- Step 4: Photos \(optional\) - multiple photo upload with preview grid
- Step indicators with visual progress tracking
- Form validation with disabled state for Next button
- Mobile-optimized step labels and button text

UI/UX Improvements:
- Compact input fields \(reduced padding from py-3 to py-2\)
- Responsive typography \(smaller on mobile, larger on desktop\)
- Reduced spacing on mobile devices for better content density
- Mobile-friendly button labels \("Add" vs "Add Building", "Next" vs "Next Step"\)
- Sticky navigation with modal scroll lock
- Smooth transitions and hover effects
- Touch-friendly button sizes on mobile

Tailwind CSS Integration:
- Custom component classes \(.btn-primary, .btn-secondary, .card, .input-field\)
- Philippine flag color palette \(primary blue #0038a8, secondary red #ce1126, accent yellow #fcd116\)
- Responsive breakpoints \(sm: 640px, md: 768px, lg: 1024px\)
- Google Fonts integration \(Inter for body, Poppins for headings\)

Technical Implementation:
- React hooks for state management \(useState, useEffect\)
- Controlled form inputs with validation
- Modal with click-outside-to-close functionality
- Body scroll lock when modal is open
- Photo preview using URL.createObjectURL with cleanup
- Browser Geolocation API integration
- Separate BuildingWizard component for better code organization

Mobile Optimizations:
- Smaller modal padding and borders on mobile
- Compact step indicators \(w-7 h-7 on mobile vs w-9 h-9 on desktop\)
- Reduced gap between grid items \(gap-4 on mobile vs gap-6 on desktop\)
- Shorter text labels on mobile screens
- Min height adjustments for mobile \(320px vs 380px\)
